title: Automaton Agents Overview
description: Multi-agent system for computational topology canvas spanning dimensions 0D-7D

component.title: 0D-Topology-Agent
component.content:
Maintains quantum vacuum topology and identity processes

**Church Encoding:** r5rs:church-zero
**Purpose:** Base foundation for all dimensional agents

component.title: 1D-Temporal-Agent
component.content:
Handles temporal evolution and Church successor operations

**Church Encoding:** r5rs:church-succ
**Dependencies:** 0D-Topology-Agent

component.title: 2D-Structural-Agent
component.content:
Manages spatial structure and pattern encoding

**Church Encoding:** r5rs:church-pair
**Dependencies:** 1D-Temporal-Agent

component.title: 3D-Algebraic-Agent
component.content:
Performs Church algebra operations

**Church Encoding:** r5rs:church-add, r5rs:church-mult, r5rs:church-exp
**Dependencies:** 2D-Structural-Agent

component.title: 4D-Network-Agent
component.content:
Manages spacetime and network operations

**Capabilities:** IPv4/IPv6, localhost, CI/CD
**Dependencies:** 3D-Algebraic-Agent

component.title: 5D-Consensus-Agent
component.content:
Implements distributed consensus and blockchain operations

**Requirements:** MUST implement exactly one blockchain system
**Dependencies:** 4D-Network-Agent

component.title: 6D-Intelligence-Agent
component.content:
Handles emergent AI and neural network operations

**Requirements:** MUST implement exactly one AI system
**Dependencies:** 5D-Consensus-Agent

component.title: 7D-Quantum-Agent
component.content:
Manages quantum superposition and entanglement

**Requirements:** MUST implement exactly one qubit system
**Dependencies:** 6D-Intelligence-Agent
